nodes.text: The Klatooine paddy frog was a species of frog from Klatooine that made up part of a Hutt's diet. Jabba kept an aquarium of these frogs by his throne at all times. The term "paddy frog" was also used by journalist Suralinda Javos toward the Resistance pilot Poe Dameron. Around 34 ABY, the Klatooinian paddy frog was sold at Ronto Roasters, a restaurant at Black Spire Outpost on Batuu, in a small drink container with a variety of beverages.
